translation.en: Terms of Use
Please select a language
You understand that the following applies to this website. By proceeding further, you are agreeing to these Terms of Use.
translation.zh: 您了解以下內容適用於本網站。如要繼續使用本網站，即表示您同意以上使用條款.

translation.en: We are not affiliated to any political individuals nor movements.
translation.zh: 本網站不隸屬於任何政治人物或運動。

translation.en: We are not liable for any potential misuses.
translation.zh: 本網站對任何潛在的濫用不承擔任何責任。

translation.en: We use tracking cookies to give you the best online experience.
translation.zh: 本網站使用跟踪cookie為您提供最佳的在線體驗。

translation.en: Do you want to proceed and have tracking cookies enabled?
translation.zh: 您是否願意繼續並啟用跟踪Cookie嗎?

translation.en: Yes, I accept tracking
No, I wish to exit the website

Further Information
On this tab, we describe how this website was constructed and ways to contribute.
translation.zh: 此頁旨在簡介此網站的製作方法，以及參與的途徑。

translation.en: Note, the aim of this app is to provide a convenient site for accessing the Facebook pages of district councillors in Hong Kong.
translation.zh: 此網站旨在提供一站式資源，方便各位尋找和瀏覽香港各區區議員的 Facebook 專頁。

translation.en: This website is not affiliated to any political individuals nor movements.
translation.zh: 此網站並不從屬於任何政治人物或運動。

translation.en: Want to contribute?
If you wish to contribute to the project, do get in touch!
translation.zh: 若你有興趣參與製作本網站，請與我們聯絡！

translation.en: You can contact us via the Octocat and Mail buttons at the top-right of the website.
translation.zh: 你可以透過網站右上方的 Github 及電郵連結聯絡我們。

translation.en: Please also read the
Contributor Code of Conduct
